languages.text: "О, это дар. Цепи звенят, возвещая о приближении Здены. Остальные слышат". {n}Потемневшая от болезни ладонь скользит по шершавой ржавчине маски.{/n} "Они прячутся, страшась стать такой же, как Здена. Боятся потерять лицо... ха-ха-ха!"

"Ah, these. Gifts, they are. The chains clink to announce Zdena's approach. For others to hear." {n}She slides her disease-darkened palm down the rough, rusted metal of her mask.{/n} "They hide, fearful of becoming like Zdena. Afraid of losing face... ha ha ha!"
languages.original_text: "О, это дар. Цепи звенят, возвещая о приближении Здены. Остальные слышат". {n}Потемневшая от болезни ладонь скользит по шершавой ржавчине маски.{/n} "Они прячутся, страшась стать такой же, как Здена. Боятся потерять лицо... ха-ха-ха!"

traits.locale_text: "Ah, they're a gift. The chains clink, announcing Zena's approach. For others to hear." {n}She slides her disease-darkened palm down her mask's rough, rusted metal.{/n} "They hide, fearful of becoming like Zdena. Afraid of a loss of face... ha ha ha!"

"Ah, these. Gifts, they are. The chains clink to announce Zdena's approach. For others to hear." {n}She slides her disease-darkened palm down the rough, rusted metal of her mask.{/n} "They hide, fearful of becoming like Zdena. Afraid of losing face... ha ha ha!"

languages.text: «Ah, esto. Regalos, son. Las cadenas tintinean para anunciar la llegada de Zdena. Para que otros lo sepan». {n}Desliza su mano, oscurecida por la enfermedad, por la superficie de metal irregular y oxidado de su máscara.{/n} «Se esconden por miedo a acabar como Zdena. Por miedo a perder la cara... ¡ja, ja, ja!».
languages.original_text: "Ah, these. Gifts, they are. The chains clink to announce Zdena's approach. For others to hear." {n}She slides her disease-darkened palm down the rough, rusted metal of her mask.{/n} "They hide, fearful of becoming like Zdena. Afraid of losing face... ha ha ha!"

traits.locale_text: «Ah, esto. Regalos, son. Las cadenas tintinean para anunciar la llegada de Zdena. Para que otros lo sepan». {n}Desliza su mano, oscurecida por la enfermedad, por la superficie de metal irregular y oxidado de su máscara.{/n} «Se esconden por miedo a acabar como Zdena. Por miedo a perder la cara... ¡ja, ja, ja!».

languages.text: 「ああ、それ。贈り物よ、それは。鎖のなる音が、ズデナの接近を告げる。他の人にも聞こえるように」{n}彼女は仮面の錆びてざらついた金属に、病気で黒ずんだ手のひらを滑らせる。{/n}「彼らは隠れる、ズデナのようになることを恐れて。顔がなくなるのを怖がって…ハハハ！」
languages.original_text: "Ah, these. Gifts, they are. The chains clink to announce Zdena's approach. For others to hear." {n}She slides her disease-darkened palm down the rough, rusted metal of her mask.{/n} "They hide, fearful of becoming like Zdena. Afraid of losing face... ha ha ha!"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、それ。贈り物よ、それは。鎖のなる音が、ズデナの接近を告げる。他の人にも聞こえるように」{n}彼女は仮面の錆びてざらついた金属に、病気で黒ずんだ手のひらを滑らせる。{/n}「彼らは隠れる、ズデナのようになることを恐れて。顔がなくなるのを怖がって…ハハハ！」

languages.text: “啊，这些啊，它们是礼物。锁链叮当作响，宣布兹迪娜的到来，让那些人听。”{n}她用被感染的手掌摩挲着生了锈的金属面具，手从粗糙的面具上滑了下来。{/n}“他们躲起来，害怕变成兹迪娜的样子，害怕失去他们的脸……哈哈哈！”
languages.original_text: "Ah, these. Gifts, they are. The chains clink to announce Zdena's approach. For others to hear." {n}She slides her disease-darkened palm down the rough, rusted metal of her mask.{/n} "They hide, fearful of becoming like Zdena. Afraid of losing face... ha ha ha!"

traits.locale_text: “啊，这些啊，它们是礼物。锁链叮当作响，宣布兹迪娜的到来，让那些人听。”{n}她用被感染的手掌摩挲着生了锈的金属面具，手从粗糙的面具上滑了下来。{/n}“他们躲起来，害怕变成兹迪娜的样子，害怕失去他们的脸……哈哈哈！”

languages.text: "Ach, das. Das sind Geschenke. Die Ketten klirren, wenn Zdena sich nähert. Damit andere es hören." {n}Sie steckt ihre von Krankheit geschwärzte Handfläche in das grobe, verkrustete Metall ihrer Maske.{/n} "Sie verstecken sich, aus Angst, so zu werden wie Zdena. Aus Angst, das Gesicht zu verlieren ... ha ha ha!"
languages.original_text: "Ah, these. Gifts, they are. The chains clink to announce Zdena's approach. For others to hear." {n}She slides her disease-darkened palm down the rough, rusted metal of her mask.{/n} "They hide, fearful of becoming like Zdena. Afraid of losing face... ha ha ha!"

traits.locale_text: "Ach, das. Das sind Geschenke. Die Ketten klirren, wenn Zdena sich nähert. Damit andere es hören." {n}Sie steckt ihre von Krankheit geschwärzte Handfläche in das grobe, verkrustete Metall ihrer Maske.{/n} "Sie verstecken sich, aus Angst, so zu werden wie Zdena. Aus Angst, das Gesicht zu verlieren ... ha ha ha!"

languages.text: « Ah, ça ? Ce sont des cadeaux. Les chaînes annoncent l'arrivée de Zdena. Pour que les autres sachent. » {n}Elle fait glisser sa paume marquée par la maladie le long de son masque rugueux couvert de rouille.{/n} « Ils se cachent, ils ont peur de devenir comme Zdena. Ils ont peur de perdre la face... ha ha ha ! »
languages.original_text: "Ah, these. Gifts, they are. The chains clink to announce Zdena's approach. For others to hear." {n}She slides her disease-darkened palm down the rough, rusted metal of her mask.{/n} "They hide, fearful of becoming like Zdena. Afraid of losing face... ha ha ha!"

traits.locale_text: « Ah, ça ? Ce sont des cadeaux. Les chaînes annoncent l'arrivée de Zdena. Pour que les autres sachent. » {n}Elle fait glisser sa paume marquée par la maladie le long de son masque rugueux couvert de rouille.{/n} « Ils se cachent, ils ont peur de devenir comme Zdena. Ils ont peur de perdre la face... ha ha ha ! »

languages.text: "Ha, bunları diyorsun. Hediyedir bunlar. Zincirler, tıkırdayarak Zdena'nın yaklaştığını müjdeliyor ki diğerleri de duyabilsin." {n}Hastalıktan kararmış avcunu maskesinin kaba, paslı metali üzerinde gezdiriyor.{/n} "Saklanır onlar, Zdena gibi olmaya korkarlar. Yüzlerini kaybetmekten ürkerler... Ha ha ha!"
languages.original_text: "Ah, these. Gifts, they are. The chains clink to announce Zdena's approach. For others to hear." {n}She slides her disease-darkened palm down the rough, rusted metal of her mask.{/n} "They hide, fearful of becoming like Zdena. Afraid of losing face... ha ha ha!"
